Question
========

In a given game, you can lose 10 euros with 60% chance or win 50 euro with a 40% chance. What is the average return (*expected value*) of this game?

Answerlist
----------

* 14 euro.
* 20 euro.
* 26 euros.

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 14 euro: Correct
* 20 euro: Incorrect
* 26 euro.: Incorrect
